item.title: Shooters Fes 2025 schedule announced
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/shooters-fes-2025-schedule-announced

A weekend of shoot 'em ups.

City Connection has announced the live stream schedule for shoot ’em up games event Shooters Fes 2025, which will run from June 14 to 15 at Mikado Game Center in Shinjuku, Tokyo, Japan.

Here is the full schedule of events, which will be live streamed on YouTube:

(All times are Japan Standard Time.)

June 14

  • 12:00 to 13:00 – Opening + Secret Title – To be announced.
  • 13:00 to 14:00 – Sonic Wings Reunion – To be announced.
  • 14:00 to 15:00 – G-MODE Archives+ Armored Core Mobile 2 – Featuring G-MODE Archives producer Koichi Takeshita and director Yuki Hatta.
  • 15:00 to 16:00 – Tatsujin Extreme – Featuring Tatsujin game metal guitarist Hirohiko Atobe.
  • 16:00 to 17:00 – R-Type Tactics I • II Cosmos – Featuring Granzella chief producer and game designer Kazuma Kujo.
  • 17:00 to 18:00 – Earthion – Featuring Ancient development director Makoto Wada, Ancient president and CEO Yuzo Koshiro, and Superdeluxe Games studio manager KAORI.
  • 18:00 to 19:00 – Operation Night Strikers – Featuring TAITO producer Yuichi Toyama, TAITO and ZUNTATA sound designer Katsuhisa Ishikawa, M2 president Naoki Horii, and M2 public relations representative Hibana Yokeru.
  • 19:00 to 20:00 – Gradius ORIGINS – Featuring M2 president Naoki Horii, M2ShotTriggers general director Kazuki Kubota, M2 public relations representative Hibana Yokeru, and Konami producer Ryosaku Ueno.
  • 20:00 to 21:00 – Zaleste – Featuring production development group / production department manager Hiroshi Aoki, production development group / marketing manager Rank-and-File Employee Dogoo, and M2 president Naoki Horii.
  • 21:00 to 22:00 – Alice Gear Aegis – Featuring Alice Gear Aegis development director Junichi Kashiwagi, operations director Jun Kaga, and script director Yuuichi Imamura.
  • 22:00 to 23:00 – Moss: Coming Soon – To be announced.

June 15

  • 12:00 to 13:00 – Toaplan Arcade Collection Vol. 1 / Toaplan Arcade Collection Vol. 2 – To be announced.
  • 13:00 to 14:00 – Final Formation – To be announced.
  • 14:00 to 15:00 – Earthion exA Label – Featuring exA-Arcadia / AM development department president Eric Chung, voice actor Charlie, exA-Arcadia AM development’s James, MOF, TRP, and ADR, Cosmo Machia president Kazunobu Mori, Ancient president and CEO Yuzo Koshiro, and STUDIO Hisekutta mangaka and illustrator Junya Inoue.
  • 15:00 to 16:00 – Cotton Reboot! High Tension! – Featuring BEEP producer RF-Maruyama and voice actor Charlie.
  • 16:00 – Mebius: Coming Soon – To be announced.
  • 17:00 to 18:30 – Snow Bros. Special Anniversary Edition / Snow Bros. 2 Special / G’AIM’E x Time Crisis – Featuring Happinet unofficial public relations representatives Nick and Tom, and Tassei Denki public relations representatives Richard Fukumoto and Rachel Nakahara.
  • 19:00 to 20:00 – NeverAwake Downloadable Content “Flashback” – Featuring Neotro‘s Hiroshi Sawatari and Phoenixx events manager Yamaguchi.
  • 20:00 to 21:00 – Mamorukun ReCurse! – To be announced.
  • 21:00 to 22:00 – Grand Finale – To be announced.

item.title: SHIFT UP’s Project Witches becomes Project Spirits, now recruiting development staff
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/shift-ups-project-witches-becomes-project-spirits-now-recruiting-development-staff

The company's next flagship property following Stellar Blade and NIKKE.

SHIFT UP has revealed that its upcoming cross-platform title, previously code-named Project Witches, will now be known as Project Spirits. The studio describes the game as a subculture title that “embraces the theme of ‘Eastern Fantasy,'” with a global release planned for 2027.

“Project Spirits is SHIFT UP’s new flagship project, a subculture cross-platform title that embraces the concept of ‘EASTERN Fantasy,'” reads the game’s description on the SHIFT UP website. “As a new [intellectual property] following Stellar Blade and NIKKE, it is currently in development as a top-tier quality game for the industry, building on SHIFT UP’s proven track record and expertise in [intellectual property] creation demonstrated through previous projects.”

SHIFT UP also posted job listings for several Project Spirits development roles, including background artist, battle planner, character artist, lead content planner, level designer, monster artist, previsualization artist, and screenwriter. Among the qualifications are proficiency in Unreal Engine 5, experience in planning Japanese RPGs or anime-style games, and creating open-world environments, large maps, and dungeons.

item.title: Brave x Junction demo now available
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/brave-x-junction-demo-now-available

  • PC

Try out RideonJapan's blackjack RPG.

RideonJapan has released a demo for blackjack RPG Brave x Junction for PC via Steam. It features English and Japanese language options.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Brave x Junction is an RPG where you battle monsters in a back-and-forth contest of blackjack, the playing card game familiar to many.

Defeat the monsters and delve dungeons. A fun tale of adventure all while being simple to play.

Key Features

  • Blackjack Style Turn-Based Battle System
    • Battles are a one-on-one turn-based system.
    • Who has the closest number to 21 in their hand? They deal an attack to the opponent!
    • Three distinctive playable characters make an appearance: The Fighter, with a head on battle-like creed; the Thief, unrivaled in sensing danger and thwarting it; and the Magician, who employs trickery at will!
    • Leave your strategy to chance? Entrap the enemy with trickery? The way you enjoy is up to you, the player.
  • Diverse Array of Monsters
    • Slimes, orcs, dragons, and monsters, familiar to fantasy RPGs all lurk out of the depths, one after another.
    • Card hand concealing ghosts, trolls that surpass the 21-card value limit, and many more with a diverse array of skills stand in the way of the player.
    • Monsters from Rideon Japan‘s Adventure Bar Story and Mercenaries Saga series games even make an appearance!
  • Loads of Factors to Augment, Unfolding a Blackjack Victory
    • Acquire boost cards as you advance the adventure, strengthening status and learning skills.
    • Abilities come along with some weapons and accessories, and at the Armory & Forge in town, synthesis can allow for unbound customization.
    • Combining skills with abilities? This could bring to life new tactics.
    • Can you traverse the untrodden dungeons? It’s all up to you, the player!

A release date for Brave x Jucntion has yet to be announced.
